text: Thank you for your input! Then I will hope they will release the API feature soon.
<@U01QVR44MEY> Update dynamicPageHubDbTableId does not work or compatible if the dynamicPageDataSourceType = 2 (Object-based dynamic page)

Hi friends. Has anyone been able to push messages from an external platform in a HubSpot ticket record.

Have been reviewing these docs and as it's in beta just seeing how much success people have had with it / not

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations>
Yep I've had a lot of success with it. Use this endpoint:
To create new message for a given conversation
You will need to know what the conversation ID is though, but you can find that super easily with the associations api

in the past, any beta experience Iâ€™ve work in, inside HubSpot generally has the base tech stuff on point, while some of the syntax/experience may change along the way. If you are building for production with a beta item, make sure you have time planned down the road to review as the beta moves to production and if any changes are made
This api has been in beta for like 1.5 years (or at least it feels like that) so I don't really expect any breaking changes

So, this is interesting. I think it has more to do with lack of documentation and maybe not a bug?

No matter which email I send this request with, I always get the same subscription id. Unless the email has been explicitly unsubscribed beforehand (using the `/communication-preferences/v3/unsubscribe` endpoint), it will just return subscribed each time... and this is true for emails that are completely new and not added as contacts on HubSpot.

Any HubSpot engineers in the group care to chime in?
<@UD53A9UUR> whatcha doing right now?
Maybe Dennis can help us figure this out
Woah I've never seen it happen in person. Summoning a HubSpot Genius. :exploding_head:
magic
unicorn magic
let me take a look and get back to you.
you only get three wishes, nick
I'm glad to even have one so thanks for the spoiler that I get more!
I wish for more wishes

So this is WAD presently, but there has been feedback about it being confusing.  i have added your voice to the list of confused folks :slightly_smiling_face: Is this a blocker for you or just something you caught and wanted to flag?
Wad?
Working as designed?

Ty! That sounds good.

I just need a simple endpoint that would allow me to check if a user had opted in/out from an email subscription. If this is the case, then I can make my logic to work with this endpoint (don't think there is another endpoint that exists afaik). Just caught this behaviour and thought that it was really weird, as it was returning a successful response for random emails :smile:
I'd do a v1 contact lookup to verify they exist if necessary

thanks for letting us know.  it really does influence the development of our APIs.
unless you are <@U01QVR44MEY>. We ignore that one :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
hahahaha
there's always a lot of requests
Lol
by v1 contact, do you mean this endpoint? <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_contact_by_email>
ty for the trick, I tested this endpoint but this won't show me if a person has opted in/out from email subscription.
But it will tell you if the contact is a contact in HubSpot
Yeah. The idea is if you have doubt in if user exists, this will help you work around the sub throwing data that doesn't match up
Sub=api
Ah ok cool, I understand now. Ty everyone! :clap:

Hi everyone, I'm trying to integrate HubSpot into my application in WeWeb but can't even pass the authentication phase. I hope someone out here has integrated HubSpot into WeWeb before.

The problem I'm facing is using the token endpoint: <https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>
It returns with a 500 status code with an INTERNAL_ERROR description in the response object.

Hello everyone, as you can see in the image attached, just installed two HubSpot integration one for our test env. and another for our production env. , test env. works properly but production doesn't and while trying to oauth tokens didn't write to our config files. What can be the reason? When we want to list our app in market place, should it published to be available to use? The main issue I got while trying connect auth token and resresh token on test env, but can not get any token from prod and didn't get any error what can be issue?
